block.p: FORGASH-Sylvia. Yeshivah of Flatbush deeply mourns the passing of Sylvia Forgash, beloved mother of Honorary Trustee Jack Forgash and Phyllis Bruder. Our heartfelt condolences are extended to the Forgash family. May they be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Paul Kopyt, President Dennis M. Eisenberg, Executive Vice President
FORGASH-Sylvia. Young Israel of Flatbush mourns the passing of our beloved member & supporter, Sylvia Forgash. Kenneth Auman, Rabbi Mark Goldstein, President
